participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and a bit anxious, she finds solace in baking and the community around her.
participant_1.background: i am scared of dying. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i've a dogs. i love to bake cookies.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Energetic and adventurous, he enjoys outdoor activities and is passionate about animal rights.
participant_2.background: my bedroom is purple and lime green. i like riding horses. i'll graduate from high school in two years. i am a vegan.

content.text: I love cookies, and i love to bake.
